japanese: 年に一度の学園祭ぐらい、/好きにさせてくれてもいいと思わない！？
english: Don't you think it's fine /to let us do as we want for the once-a-year festival!?

japanese: 岩のツープラトン技/!c03『活火山』!c07を覚えた！
english: Learned Iwa's Two-Platoon technique /!c03'Active Volcano'!c07!

japanese: 岩クンが美術の時間に描いた絵を見て、/美術部の展示に加えたいって思ったの！
english: I saw Iwa-kun's painting from art class /and wanted to add it to the art club display!

japanese: 彼らは、母国ですべき事があるからこそ、/帰国したのです。
english: They returned because /they have things to do in their home country.

japanese: 恭介から/!c02届け物『調査書』!c07をあずかった/!c01風紀委員室!c07に届けよう！
english: Received 'Investigation Form' from Kyosuke /deliver to !c01Discipline Committee Room!c07!

japanese: 必殺技を覚えた！/さらに!0の!c04ＨＰ!c07が!1回復！
english: Learned special move! /Plus !0's !c04HP!c07 recovered by !1!

japanese: 恭介とは、/互いの理想が異なる事を知った今、/行動を共にする理由はない。
english: With Kyosuke, now knowing our ideals differ, /there's no reason to act together.

japanese: 岩が望むなら、ずっと側にいるよ……。
english: If Iwa wants, I'll always be by your side...

japanese: 当たり前だ。/一時の油断が身を滅ぼすのだ。
english: Of course. /A moment's carelessness destroys you.

japanese: 思いっ切り遊べば、/気も晴れるんじゃない？
english: If you play hard, /your mood will improve, right?

japanese: 恭介、/あなたのツープラトン技を/教えてくれない？
english: Kyosuke, /can you teach me /your Two-Platoon technique?

japanese: 岩！/俺を待ってたんだな。
english: Iwa! /You were waiting for me.

japanese: 弟？/子供？/迷子？
english: Brother?/ Child?/ Lost?

japanese: 心外だな。/アイツらと一緒にするなって！
english: That's insulting. /Don't group me with them!

japanese: 恭介。/風紀委員ってさぁ、/適当に校内を動き回ってるの？
english: Kyosuke. /Discipline committee /just wanders around school?

japanese: 必殺技の組み合わせが変わった
english: Special move combination changed

japanese: 悪い悪い。/!0君は、/水泳部の出し物が何か、知ってるかい？
english: Sorry sorry. /!0-kun, /know what the swimming club is doing?

japanese: 怒らせちゃった……。/やっぱり身長のこと、/気にしてたのね……。
english: I made them angry... /They were worried about height after all...

japanese: 性別を登録してね！
english: Register your gender!

japanese: 悪いのは不良だもん！/ももちゃんは悪くないもん！
english: The delinquents are wrong! /Momo-chan isn't wrong!

japanese: 岩じゃないか。/それに佐渡先生まで……。/何してるんですか？
english: Isn't that Iwa. /And Sado-sensei too... /What are you doing?

japanese: 恭介……
english: Kyosuke...

japanese: 恭介、/お前のツープラトン技を/教えてくれよ。
english: Kyosuke, /teach me your Two-Platoon technique.

japanese: 恭介って……/ジャスティス学園に転校しようと/思った事はないの？
english: Kyosuke... /never thought about transferring to Justice Academy?

japanese: 恭介は、/相変わらずクラブ活動には/参加していないの？
english: Kyosuke still /doesn't participate in club activities?

japanese: 悪い悪い。/!0さんは、/水泳部の出し物が何か、知ってるかい？
english: Sorry sorry. /!0-san, /know what the swimming club is doing?

japanese: 愛情/楽しいこと/恐怖
english: Love/ Fun things/ Fear

japanese: 岩と……、なに？
english: With Iwa... what?

japanese: 岩！/私を待っててくれたんだ。
english: Iwa! /You were waiting for me.

japanese: 己を鍛え直し、/俺自身のケジメをつけるためにな。
english: To retrain myself /and settle things my own way.

japanese: 恭介……ゴメン……
english: Kyosuke... sorry...

japanese: 恭介ー。/こんなところで寝てると/風邪ひいちゃうぞー。
english: Kyosuke~. /Sleeping here will make you catch a cold~.
